title: Reward of praying Isha & Fajr in congregation? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says what is the reward of praying fajr and isha in congregation the prophet said in an authentic hadith al-salam whoever prays risha in congregation allah would reward him as if he prayed half of the night night prayer and whoever prays fajr in congregation allah would reward him as if he prayed the whole night night prayer you
